title: Amazon to raise $15 billion in first US bond sale in three years
description: AMAZON will raise $15 billion from its first US dollar bond offering in three years, according to a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission on Monday, as big tech firms ramp up investments in artificial intelligence (AI) infrastructure.
content:
AMAZON will raise $15 billion from its first US dollar bond offering in three years, according to a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission on Monday, as big tech firms ramp up investments in artificial intelligence (AI) infrastructure.

title: Russia's New Electronics Tax: Boosting Domestic Industry Amid Sanctions
description: Russia plans to implement a new tax on imported electronics, generating $2.7 billion to support its domestic industry, especially the defense sector. This comes amid sanctions affecting western chip access and aims to boost the competitiveness of Russia's artificial intelligence endeavors.
content: Russia has announced plans to introduce a new tax on imported electronics, a significant move expected to generate $2.7 billion. The revenue aims to bolster the domestic electronics industry, with strategic focus on the defense sector, over the next ... [836 chars]

title: BofA says AI is boosting bankers' productivity, revenue
description: NEW YORK — Bank of America (BofA) plans to spend billions of dollars on technologies such as artificial intelligence (AI) to boost bankers’ productivity and bring in more revenue, its chief technology and information officer said on Monday.
content:
NEW YORK — Bank of America (BofA) plans to spend billions of dollars on technologies such as artificial intelligence (AI) to boost bankers’ productivity and bring in more revenue, its chief technology and information officer said on Monday.

title: Cloudflare outage disrupts major online services worldwide
description: A MAJOR outage at a global internet infrastructure and security company on Tuesday, November 18, caused widespread disruptions across the internet, taking down social media platforms, artificial intelligence services, transport apps and enterprise systems worldwide.

title: Google launches Gemini 3, embeds AI model into search immediately
description: Alphabet's Google on Tuesday launched the latest version of its artificial intelligence model Gemini, emphasizing that the new capabilities will be immediately available in several profit-generating products like its search engine.
content: Gemini 3, arriving 11 months after the second generation of the model, appears on paper to keep Google at the forefront of the AI race. During a press briefing, executives highlighted Gemini 3's lead position on several popular industry leaderboards ... [2964 chars]

title: Microsoft launches tracker to manage autonomous AI in the workplace
description: In Microsoft's view, humans are not the only ones to manage in a workplace. Artificial intelligence needs a manager, too.
content:
The software maker on Tuesday announced Microsoft Agent 365, a program for its customers to track what it expects to be 1.3 billion agents automating office work by 2028. Agents are AI-powered programs that perform tasks on humans' behalf.

title: The AI revolution: A way forward
description: GEBZE, Turkey — Artificial intelligence (AI) is rapidly changing our world. It has helped a few companies in developed countries set record-breaking profits. Last month, Nvidia, a leading United States AI company, hit a market value of $5 trillion.

title: Google Unveils Gemini 3, With Improved Coding and Search Abilities
description: The new artificial intelligence model is the second the company has released this year. OpenAI and Anthropic made similar updates a few months ago.
content:
After several years of criticism that it was lagging behind in artificial intelligence, Google is turning up its competition with smaller start-ups like OpenAI and Anthropic.
